name: Ambush Awareness
text: You are always on your toes and are rarely caught off-guard for long, even when an enemy gets the jump on you.
benefit: If you are unable to act in the surprise round because you failed a Perception check, you can still act on your initiative count in the surprise round, but only to take the total defense action.
normal: If you are unable to act in the surprise round because you failed a Perception check, you canâ€™t take any actions during the surprise round.
staminaText: You can spend 3 stamina points to grant the benefit of this feat to an adjacent ally. (Dirty Tactics Toolbox 12)
